description: Non-REM RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 ) / ( slpprdp - minremp )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-rem RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation
